## ðŸ”’ The Bitcoin Chronicles - 1.F.7 - The Discipline of Waiting

Waiting was once treated as inefficiency. At the outer edges, it became a moral practice. This essay examines how civilizations learned to live responsibly when answers would arrive too late to matter.

---

tags: ðŸ”’ The Bitcoin Chronicles - 1.F.7 - The Discipline of Waiting

Waiting was once treated as inefficiency. At the outer edges, it became a moral practice. This essay examines how civilizations learned to live responsibly when answers would arrive too late to matter.
